page.title: 13LIFE STYLES
page.content: Biggar is a vibrant community with a wide variety of {Hotels ,Pubs ,and {Cafes.} The majority of these are located in the centre of Biggar. The most centrally placed {Hotel }is the Elpinstone,an old eighteenth century coaching {Hotel.} This {Hotel }is famous for its high quality cuisine.There are other {Hotels }on the periphery of Biggar like the Toftcombs and the Southpark,which attract a good deal of custom .On the edge of the survey area is the Hartree {Hotel},which is a nice country { {Hotel . }There is only one proper Chinese Restaurant though there is another Chinese Take away.There is agood selection of{Pubs}of which several provide life music.Finally there are a couple of good cafes,which provide locals and visitors with a good service.
